listing_by_account.map: function (doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'task' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc._id, doc.pvt_account_id], { 'id':doc._id, 'node':(doc.pvt_worker_node)?doc.pvt_worker_node:undefined, 'account_id':doc.pvt_account_id, 'category':doc.pvt_category, 'action':doc.pvt_action, 'submit_timestamp':doc.pvt_submitted_at, 'start_timestamp':(doc.pvt_started_at)?doc.pvt_started_at:undefined, 'end_timestamp':(doc.pvt_ended_at)?doc.pvt_ended_at:undefined, 'failure_count':(doc.pvt_total_rows_failed)?doc.pvt_total_rows_failed:undefined, 'success_count':(doc.pvt_total_rows_succeeded)?doc.pvt_total_rows_succeeded:undefined, 'status':(doc.pvt_status)?doc.pvt_status:undefined }); }
